title: Rodrigo Goulart
description: Passionate about technology, design and experienced in multiple projects focused on design, usability, and user experience, combining functionality and aesthetics. In the environments where I work, I am always recognized for creativity and commitment, delivering the best of myself.
about_me: Full Stack Developer with solid experience in web and mobile applications, working with Laravel, Vue.js, React, and Node.js. I participate in the complete development cycle, from API architecture and implementation to the delivery of scalable, high-performance interfaces. I have strong expertise in version control with Git and agile methodologies (Scrum), applying clean code and software design best practices. I constantly seek to elevate the quality of digital solutions, exploring Artificial Intelligence and new technologies to generate innovation and business value.
